Row.Text: Every map is unique. Generates Earth-like continents with fractal coastlines, scattered archipelagos, and asymmetric landmass sizes. Parameters randomized each game for maximum replayability.
Controls how human players are placed relative to each other and to distant lands.
Human players spawn on the same or nearby continents. Ideal for cooperative and team-based play. Maximizes distant lands for shared exploration.
Human players spawn on different continents for competitive play. Always preserves at least one continent as distant lands for the exploration race.
No special placement for humans. All players distributed proportionally by continent size. Maximum unpredictability.
